SELECT a.ID as team , IFNULL(count(b.team),0) as lastestPageNum from TB_CODE a Left join TB_COMMUNITY b on b.TEAM = a.ID and b.LAST_DT > date_sub(now(),interval 7 day) AND DELFLAG = 'N' Where a.CATEGORY ='TEAM' AND a.ID != "10" Group by b.TEAM, a.ID ORDER BY team ASC
